smg.text: Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Light rain at night. Force 4 to 5 east to northeasterly winds with gusts.
Cloudy. Periods of rain. Force 3 to 4 easterly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
Mainly cloudy. Rain at first. Mist at first. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds, becoming force 5 northerly winds with gusts.
Temperature falling. Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 to 5 north to northeasterly winds with gusts.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 2 to 3 easterly winds.
